sentence.Network_en: The government will commandeer ships only in wartime.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府只会在战争期间征募船只。

sentence.Network_en: He decides to commandeer their room.
sentence.Network_cn: 他决定强行占用他们的房间。

sentence.Network_en: The organisers set off across London, seeking any open - topped vehicle to commandeer.
sentence.Network_cn: 组织者纷纷出动遍寻伦敦, 征募任何趟篷交通工具.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Afrikaans kommandeer, from Dutch commanderen, from French commander 'to command' (see command)

entry.def: If the armed forces commandeer a vehicle or building owned by someone else, they officially take charge of it so that they can use it.

example.ex: The soldiers commandeered vehicles in the capital and occupied the television station...
example.tran: 士兵们征用首都的车辆，并且占领了电视台。

example.ex: They drove in convoy round the city in commandeered cars.
example.tran: 他们开着征用的小车，在城里结队而行。

entry.def: To commandeer something owned by someone else means to take charge of it so that you can use it.

example.ex: He decides to commandeer their room...
example.tran: 他决定强行占用他们的房间。

example.ex: The hijacker commandeered the plane on a domestic flight.
example.tran: 劫机者劫持了这架国内客机。

sentences.sentence: "The Cubans commandeered the plane and flew it to Miami"

auth_sentence.content: That's all we commandeer the people to do.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's all we commandeer the people to do.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's all we commandeer the people to do.

auth_sentence.content: We commandeer people to serve in the military, to serve on juries, and to file a return and pay their taxes.
auth_sentence.res_content: We commandeer people to serve in the military, to serve on juries, and to file a return and pay their taxes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We commandeer people to serve in the military, to serve on juries, and to file a return and pay their taxes.

auth_sentence.content: Learn to Dog Sled in Germany Learn to commandeer a pack of hard-charging canines at a sledding school in deepest Germany.
auth_sentence.res_content: Learn to Dog Sled in Germany Learn to commandeer a pack of hard-charging canines at a sledding school in deepest Germany.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Learn to Dog Sled in Germany Learn to commandeer a pack of hard-charging canines at a sledding school in deepest Germany.

sentences.en: The police commandeered a passing car to help in the emergency.
sentences.cn: 警方征用经过的汽车来协助处理该宗突发事件。
